bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, freeride HT / dirt jumping / street MTB frame design with Centerfold TT, butted and manipulated DT, forged and relieved HT, forged BB shell with integrated ISCG tabs, forged horizontal dropouts, integrated derailleur hanger, asymmetrical 6mm offset rear triangle

components.description: Alloy collar with Q/R, 36.0mm ID, black
Chain stay / seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
